data.title: Deborah Meaden Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Deborah Meaden with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Set up a flower stall in her local neighbourhood at the age of seven

Led pony rides along Maidenhead seafront when she was eight years old

Worked as a sales-room model in a fashion house on leaving college

Started her own business at nineteen when she started importing and selling glass and ceramics from Italy

Joined her family's holiday businessin 1988 and led a management buyout in 1999

Joined the team on Dragons' Den in 2006 and, so far, has agreed investments in 63 businesses to the value of more than Â£3

3million

Awarded honorary degrees from Exeter University Business School and Staffordshire University, both in July 2010

Acted as a Sustainability Ambassador for the London 2012 Olympics and Paralympics

Is an Ambassador for wildlife charity World Wildlife Fund (WWF), poverty charity Lend with Care and the Roundhouse Theatre

Is a patron of the animal protection charity Tusk

Took part in the eleventh series of Strictly Come Dancing in September 2013, partnered with Robin Windsor, but was eliminated on October 26

Works with the Dogs Trust charity and is an ambassador for the Marine Conservation Society

Was given an honorary degree from Keele University in July 2013 and one from Bath Spa University in 2014
